post.text:
Education is at stake.  
The environment is at stake.  
LGBT equality are at stake.  
Equal pay is at stake. 
IWillVote.com

comment.author: Mariah
comment.text: We voted for Gary Johnson to be our next president of the United States. He is full of honesty and integrity.

replies.author: Sarajane
replies.text: That's cool. That will help bring a lot of attention to him in, 2020!!
